article.title: Top 11 Things To Do In Dubai At Night
article.lead_paragraph: Dubai is the place in the world where the word 'impossible' just doesn't exist... Being home of the largest mall in the world, the largest acrylic panel in the world, the tallest hotel in the world and the tallest building in the world to name a few, it comes as no surprise that Dubai is the perfect place to visit and get wowed away. While the city is beautiful and impressive by day, it is even more impressive at night when all buildings light up as one. We've selected 8 things for you to do at night in Dubai.
article.proposal:
1. Experience the fountain show at Dubai Mall (https://www.emaar.com/en/what-we-do/burj-khalifa/the-dubai-fountain.aspx?utm_source=google&utm_campaign=local-search&utm_medium=organic)
2. Visit one of the largest suspended aquariums in the world (http://www.thedubaiaquarium.com/en/Default.aspx)
3. Ski in the first indoor ski resort in the Middle East (Ski Dubai: https://www.theplaymania.com/skidubai)
4. Go on a safari desert tour and experience Arabian nights (https://bemyguest.com.sg/dp/united-arab-emirates/dubai/overnight-desert-safari-with-shared-transfers-and-dinner)
5. Go for a drink on the tallest restaurant in the world (At.Mosphere at Burj Khalifa - http://www.atmosphereburjkhalifa.com/) 
6. Dine in the only 7 star hotel in the world (Al Mahara restaurant - http://almaharadubai.com/)
7. Go to the club! (Zero Gravity - https://www.facebook.com/Zero.Gravity.Dubai)
8. Immerse yourself in gold, literally! (http://goldon27.com/)
article.meta_description: We've selected 8 things for you to do at night in Dubai, in the United Arab Emirates.

snippets.title: 1. Experience the fountain show at Dubai Mall
snippets.title_with_numbering: 1. Experience the fountain show at Dubai Mall
snippets.description:
Dubai is no stranger to world wide records and the Dubai fountains show at the Dubai Mall is one of them. For a first, the Dubai Mall is the largest mall in the world by total area, with a total of 1,200 shops over 1,124,000 square meters (12,098,635.3 square feet). The Dubai Mall is also home of the world’s largest acrylic panel (the aquarium), the world’s largest sweet shop, "Candylicious", spanning over 930 square meters (10,000 square feet) in addition to the fountains. 

The fountains are the world's second largest choreographed fountain system set on the Burj Khalifa Lake, in the Dubai Mall. For all lovers of Las Vegas shows, you will simply be blown away by the Dubai fountains' show. The show is every half an hour, daily from 6pm to 11:30pm as well as two shows at 1:00pm and 1:30pm.

Each show consist of a choreographed water show designed by a dance choreographer for a specific song. Each day the sequence of songs played is changing, allowing you to see all the shows in just a few days if you wish to. Watching the show is quite simple, find a spot around the lake and wait for the show to begin! The songs feature are a mix of Arabic songs, international ones (with a highlight for Michael Jackson and superb Witney Houston "I will always love you") as well as Chinese.

> #### Fountain show
>
> **Address**:  Fashion Parking - Dubai Mall - Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Blvd - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
>
> **Website**: [Fountain show](https://www.emaar.com/en/what-we-do/burj-khalifa/the-dubai-fountain.aspx?utm_source=google&utm_campaign=local-search&utm_medium=organic)

snippets.title: 2. Explore the Dubai Garden Glow
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BrGDWyrnnVT/

Dubai Garden Glow is the largest 'glow-in-dark' garden in the world made of recycled luminous fabrics and features scale models of UAE landmarks like Burj Khalifa from recycled cups and bottles. Since its opening in 2015, it has drawn millions of visitors each year. Thanks to their 500 craftsmen, engineers and architects who unceasingly create magic behind the scenes. Book this experience and capture the moment of a lifetime at this stunning theme park. As the lights are turned on, the park dazzles at night like something out of a fairy tale leaving you marvelling in awe. Get into festive spirit with a host of performances by international artists. Explore up to 10 different zones which includes Dinosaur Park, Art Park, Garden Glow, Happiness Street, just to mention a few. You can include access to the Ice Park at an extra cost. Surely, a delightful and educational treat for the entire family!


> #### Dubai Garden Glow
>
> **Price**:  17.70 USD
>
> [Book Now](https://www.headout.com/tour/7210/united-arab-emirates/dubai/dubai-garden-glow)

If you are looking for a more authentic experience, book a desert safari and hop on a 4*4 to go dune bashing before dining under the stars with Arabic dance shows and belly dancing performances. Immerse yourself in a Bedouin skin and ride a camel to catch the sunset before trying henna painting and smoking a traditional shisha. For the most adventurous, glide down the desert sand dunes during a sandboarding session.

> **Price**: 65 USD
>
> **Duration**: 6 hours

snippets.title: 8. Go to the club!
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BmLR7Fch40h/?tagged=zerogravitydubai

A visit to Dubai wouldn't be complete without going to a club! The city has a lot of clubs, playing from the 80s to EDM music, there is a club fitting for you. One of the most renown clubs, especially for all the events and festival it organizes, is Zero Gravity. Being a beach club during the day, the venue turns into a party place once the sun sets. Lay down on a sunbed during the day and look at the skydivers in the sky or admire the view onto the JBR walk before partying.

> #### Zero Gravity
>
> **Address**:  Dubai Marina, Skydive Dubai Drop Zone, King Salman bin Abdulaziz al Saud Street, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
>
> **Facebook**: [Zero Gravity](https://www.facebook.com/Zero.Gravity.Dubai)

snippets.title: 9. Visit one of the largest suspended aquariums in the world
snippets.title_with_numbering: 9. Visit one of the largest suspended aquariums in the world
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BXrnnbCgFjo/?taken-at=648950079

Located in the Dubai Mall, the Dubai Aquarium and Underwater Zoo is the perfect place for the whole family to learn about underwater lives and environment protection. Feed the ray, the sharks or just hop on the glass bottom boat to see the underwater world on your feet. You can also visit the aquarium by feet, enter a large glass tunnel and keep your head up for a memorable experience. 

The aquarium keeps on reinventing itself and improving experiences for its guests; one of the new attractions recently launched is a mermaid show, a real treat for the eyes!

> #### Dubai Aquarium and Underwater Zoo
>
> **Address**:  Ground & Level 2, The Dubai Mall - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
>
> **Website**: [Dubai Aquarium and Underwater Zoo](http://www.thedubaiaquarium.com/en/Default.aspx)

snippets.title: 10. Explore the Red Dune Desert Safari with BBQ dinner & live entertainment
snippets.title_with_numbering: 10. Explore the Red Dune Desert Safari with BBQ dinner & live entertainment
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/Bq149gCgBIf/

Enjoy Dubai the way it's meant to be enjoyed! Set out on a journey to a traditional Bedouin camp. Have fun bashing dunes through the desert aboard a 4x4 vehicle and then off to some incredible sand boarding on a quad bike. Let the giant camel lead you around the dessert. Notice its gentleness as it kneels for you to get on. Get acquainted with the hubblee-bubblee shisha. An evening full of amusement with fire shows, tanoura dancing and belly dancing awaits you. Feel the festive atmosphere as you tuck into a wide spread of a hearty BBQ buffet with bottomless drinks in the middle of desert. To complete the experience, dress on Arabic clothing (kandura and abaya) for souvenir pictures. The package includes pick up and drop off, all the activities, shows, dinner and drinks. Henna hand painting, sand arts and keepsakes are also available at an extra cost. Don't miss this authentic desert experience!

> #### Red Dune Desert Safari with BBQ dinner & live entertainment
>
> **Price**: from 18 USD 
>
> **Duration**: 5-7 hours
>
> [Book Now](https://www.headout.com/tour/1887/united-arab-emirates/dubai/red-dune-desert-safari-with-bbq-dinner-live-entertainment)

snippets.title: 11. Enjoy a dhow dinner cruise with live entertainment in Dubai Creek
snippets.title_with_numbering: 11. Enjoy a dhow dinner cruise with live entertainment in Dubai Creek
snippets.description:
A dhow is a traditional Arabic ship historically used as mode of transportation, for fishing and even pearl-diving. It is a two-masted ship rigged with triangular sails at an angle of 45 degrees. Head on to a relaxing evening. Embark on our astounding dhow cruises and discover Dubai Creek with its vibrant city. Feel the warmth of Emirati hospitality with welcome treats and live shows. See the traditional tanoura dancers and be amazed how gracefully they execute the routines in colourful costumes and weighted skirts. Then, feast on a three-course international dinner buffet in a romantic ambiance as we sail past some of Dubai's impressive landmarks. It's a magical experience drifting along the creek while watching colourful reflections out on the water of the beautifully lit up skyline of Dubai. Make sure you bring your camera as there are lots of photo opportunities. Book now for this unique and relaxing experience. The perfect antidote to a busy city life. For last minute and live availability, check out Headout (link below).


> #### Dhow dinner cruise with live entertainment in Dubai Creek
>
> **Price**: 59 USD 
>
> **Duration**: 2 hours
>
> [Headout](https://www.headout.com/tour/2325/united-arab-emirates/dubai/dhow-dinner-cruise-with-live-entertainment-in-dubai-creek-and-the-open-seas)

navigator.introduction: Elodie is an avid passport stamp collector and adventure seeker. She defines herself as storyteller, marketeer, diver and traveller - not necessarily in that order. She is currently based in Bali, Indonesia and traveling across Asia. She is passionate about food, wine, books and photography.
